title: Token Encryption
test_description: Validate that Personal Access Tokens (PAT) are properly encrypted and stored securely in Azure Key Vault with AES-256 encryption

api_calls.name: list_git_credentials
api_calls.post_processing: async function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const credentials = responseData?.credentials || []; let credentialsFound = credentials.length > 0; let tokenExposed = false; let targetCredential = null; const gitUsername = currentVariables.git_username; const providedPat = currentVariables.pat; if (gitUsername) { for (let i = 0; i < credentials.length; i++) { const cred = credentials[i]; if (cred && cred.git_username === gitUsername) { targetCredential = cred; if (cred.personal_access_token && cred.personal_access_token.length > 0) { tokenExposed = true; } break; } } } if (!targetCredential && credentials.length > 0) { targetCredential = credentials[0]; if (targetCredential.personal_access_token && targetCredential.personal_access_token.length > 0) { tokenExposed = true; } } logger.debug('Token encryption check:', { credentialsFound, credentialsCount: credentials.length, tokenExposed, hasTargetCredential: !!targetCredential, targetUsername: gitUsername, hasProvidedPat: !!providedPat }); await delay(3000); logger.debug('Waited 3s after credential check'); return { ...currentVariables, credentials_found: credentialsFound, credentials_count: credentials.length, token_exposed: tokenExposed, target_credential: targetCredential, target_git_username: gitUsername, provided_pat: providedPat }; }
